creator: Crispin.Boylan@logicacmg.com
text:
When entering user parameters the following happens:

name the user, ie user1
type in the parameter for example ${__threadNum}
click off from the user parameters item, and then back, the following is displayed:

User           Parameter
user1=user1    ${__threadNum}=${__threadNum}

in addition, when closing a test plan with a User Parameters item, then creating
a new plan and adding a user parameters item to it creates an item with all the
previous items users and parameters still in it

The mangling of String parameters was my fault - I changed the toString() 
method of the Properties element to return "name=value" instead of 
just "value". This was intended for use in logging/debugging.

I did not realise that some code was using toString() instead of 
getPropertyAsString - I've fixed some of those, but obviously I missed some. 
I'll revert the toString().
creator: sebb@apache.org
